mapper.select: SELECT * FROM jfactory_cart WHERE mem_id=#{mem_id} ORDER BY cart_datetime DESC
mapper.insert: insert into jfactory_order(or_id, mem_id, buy_realname, buy_zipcode, buy_address1, buy_address2, buy_phone, or_price, or_cancel_state, or_datetime, re_check) values(#{or_id}, #{mem_id}, #{buy_realname},#{buy_zipcode}, #{buy_address1}, #{buy_address2}, #{buy_phone},#{or_price},DEFAULT,DEFAULT,DEFAULT)
insert into jfactory_order_detail(or_id, pd_name, pd_amount) select #{or_id}, pd_name, pd_amount from jfactory_cart where jfactory_cart.mem_id=#{mem_id}
